When crawling a single host, my download rate reachs only 2 urls per
second=
. I'd like to increase the rate until either the client or the
server's res=
ources are maxed out. At 2 pages per seconds, both the
client and the serve=
r have plenty of bandwidth & cpu to spare.

So far I've reduced the frontie=
r's min-delay-ms to 0, but the rate
only changed slightly. I notice that on=
ly 2 of the 50 available
threads are active at any given time. Could this b=
e the source of the
rate limit? If so, how can I increase the number of act=
ive threads?

Btw, I own the targetted web server, so politeness is no conc=
ern.

Thank you,
Jeff
